home.heading: Unlimited Ad-Free Music and Download 30 Songs, on 1 Phone. Try Mini Now. Playlists for every moment. Music and Lyrics. Discover great new artists. Premium sound quality. Ad-free music streams.

about.aboutUs: Music is a music and podcasting service based in Stockholm, Sweden which was launched on October 7, 2008. The platform is owned by Spotify AB, a company listed on the New York Stock Exchange since 2018 under the company Music Technology S.A. based in Luxembourg.
